overview: Ben Serrano known as a brave heroic cop of Metro Manila until something happened changed his life. During a car-chase he accidentally crashes to the another vehicle including the child of a rich family killed by car accident. Now a desperate family vows revenge against Serrano forced to go in jail forever or to be killed by the family who needs justice. Serrano will take matters to his own hands to fight against all odds.
title: The Lethal Hunt
